forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later at night. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
